posts.post_title: PRICE DROPS - T205 HOF Slabs - Bresnahan SP, Wallace SP
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell the T205's below. All prices are net shipped with tracking

Roger Bresnahan Open Mouth SP SGC 1 - $200
Bobby Wallace No Cap SP SGC 1 - $200

Take the pair for $375 shipped
